CodeList.Name: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire Test Code

Description.TranslatedText: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue test code.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I feel tired.
Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I have energy (or strength).

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC099-Could Do My Usual Things at Home
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I could do my usual things at home.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Could Do My Usual Things at Home

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I had trouble starting things because I was too tired.
Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I had trouble finishing things because I was too tired.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC099-I Needed to Sleep During the Day
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I needed to sleep during the day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - I Needed to Sleep During the Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I got upset by being too tired to do things I wanted to do.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Upset by Being Too Tired

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC099-Hard for Me to Play With Friends
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - Being tired made it hard for me to play or go out with my friends as much as I'd like.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Hard for Me to Play With Friends

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I needed help doing my usual things at home.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Needed Help Doing Usual Things

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I feel weak.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: FAC099-I Was Too Tired to Eat
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - I was too tired to eat.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - I Was Too Tired to Eat

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - Being tired made me sad.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Being Tired Made Me Sad

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue - Being tired made me mad (angry).
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Peds-FACIT-F - Being Tired Made Me Mad

CodeList.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: Pediatric Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Fatigue Questionnaire Test Code
CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Peds-FACIT-F Test Code Terminology
